Articles.Content:
Salutations.

What summer camp do/did you guys go or went to?

I go to Wahanowin, a Jewish-based camp in Orillia, Ontario, on Lake Couchiching.

I may elaborate later, but I\'m not quite supposed to be on my computer right now... :-[

CONFOUND THIS PROJECT!

Anyway...

GO!

Salutations.

What summer camp do/did you guys go or went to?

I go to Wahanowin, a Jewish-based camp in Orillia, Ontario, on Lake Couchiching.

Anyway...

GO!

Ermm I\'m not giving away the name or city...

It was in PA,USA, the summer of 2010..

I fell into the pool and bumped my head...

Tripped over a fallen tree.

Banged my knees several times...

Never going into the woods again...

I still can\'t bend my knee right.
